title: Dubai Luxury Experience - 5 Days
description: Indulge in the ultimate Dubai luxury experience with 5-star accommodations, private tours, fine dining, and exclusive access to premium attractions. Perfect for those seeking the finest Dubai has to offer.
highlights: Private desert safari with exclusive camp

activities.name: Private Helicopter Tour
activities.description: Exclusive aerial tour of Dubai's iconic landmarks and coastline

activities.name: Luxury Yacht Charter
activities.description: Private yacht experience with gourmet dining and water activities

activities.name: VIP Atlantis Experience
activities.description: Exclusive access to Atlantis Resort facilities and attractions

activities.name: Fine Dining Experience
activities.description: Curated dining experiences at Dubai's most prestigious restaurants

itinerary.title: Luxury Arrival & Welcome
itinerary.description: VIP airport pickup in luxury vehicle. Check-in at 5-star hotel with suite upgrade. Welcome spa treatment. Evening welcome dinner at Burj Al Arab's Al Muntaha restaurant with panoramic city views.

itinerary.title: Sky High Dubai Experience
itinerary.description: Private helicopter tour over Dubai's iconic landmarks. VIP access to Burj Khalifa with private guide. Luxury shopping experience at Dubai Mall with personal shopping assistant. Afternoon at luxury spa. Evening fine dining at Nobu Dubai.

itinerary.title: Atlantis VIP Experience
itinerary.description: Private transfer to Atlantis Resort. VIP day pass including Lost Chambers Aquarium, Aquaventure Waterpark, and Dolphin Bay experience. Luxury spa treatment at ShuiQi Spa. Evening dinner at Ossiano underwater restaurant.

itinerary.title: Private Yacht & Desert Luxury
itinerary.description: Morning private yacht charter (4 hours) with gourmet lunch onboard. Water activities and relaxation. Afternoon return to hotel. Evening luxury desert safari with private camp, gourmet dinner, and exclusive entertainment.

itinerary.title: Final Luxury & Departure
itinerary.description: Final spa treatment and relaxation. Last-minute luxury shopping with VIP assistance. Private farewell lunch at At.mosphere restaurant in Burj Khalifa. VIP airport transfer in luxury vehicle.

fitness_requirements: No specific fitness requirements. All activities are designed for comfort and luxury. Suitable for all ages.

altitude_profile.difficulty_level: Easy luxury experience with minimal physical activity

booking_info.group_discounts: Available for private groups of 6+ people
booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 14 days before departure
